verses.verse: The words <WH1697> of Jeremiah <WH3414> the son <WH1121> of Hilkiah, <WH2518> of the priests <WH3548> who were in Anathoth <WH6068> in the land <WH776> of Benjamin: <WH1144>

to whom the word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> came in the days <WH3117> of Josiah <WH2977> the son <WH1121> of Amon, <WH526> king <WH4428> of Judah, <WH3063> in the thirteenth <WH7969> year <WH8141> of his reign. <WH4427>

It came also in the days <WH3117> of Jehoiakim <WH3079> the son <WH1121> of Josiah, <WH2977> king <WH4428> of Judah, <WH3063> to the end <WH8552> of the eleventh <WH6249> year <WH8141> of Zedekiah, <WH6667> the son <WH1121> of Josiah, <WH2977> king <WH4428> of Judah, <WH3063> to the carrying away <WH1540> of Jerusalem <WH3389> captive <WH1540> in the fifth <WH2549> month. <WH2320>
Now the word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> came to me, <WH559> saying,

"Before <WH2962> I formed <WH3335> you in the belly, <WH990> I knew <WH3045> you. <WH3318> Before you came forth out of the womb, <WH7358> I sanctified <WH6942> you. <WH5414> I have appointed you a prophet <WH5030> to the nations. <WH1471>"
Then I said, <WH559> "Ah, <WH162> Lord <WH136> Yahweh! <WH3069> Behold, <WH3045> I don't know how to speak; <WH1696> for I am a child. <WH5288>"

But Yahweh <WH3068> said <WH559> to me, <WH559> "Don't say, <WH5288> 'I am a child;' for to whoever I shall send <WH7971> you, <WH3212> you shall go, and whatever I shall command <WH6680> you, <WH1696> you shall speak.
Don't <WH3372> be afraid because of them; <WH6440> for I am with you to deliver <WH5337> you, <WH5002>" says Yahweh. <WH3068>

Then Yahweh <WH3068> put forth <WH7971> his hand, <WH3027> and touched <WH5060> my mouth; <WH6310> and Yahweh <WH3068> said <WH559> to me, <WH5414> "Behold, I have put my words <WH1697> in your mouth. <WH6310>

Behold, <WH7200> I have this day <WH3117> set <WH6485> you over the nations <WH1471> and over the kingdoms, <WH4467> to pluck up <WH5428> and to break down <WH5422> and to destroy <WH6> and to overthrow, <WH2040> to build <WH1129> and to plant. <WH5193>"
Moreover the word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> came to me, <WH559> saying, "300, <WH3414> what do you see? <WH7200>" I said, <WH559> "I see <WH7200> a branch <WH4731> of an almond tree. <WH8247>"
Then Yahweh <WH3068> said <WH559> to me, <WH7200> "You have seen well; <WH3190> for I watch <WH8245> over my word <WH1697> to perform it. <WH6213>"

The word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> came to me the second time, <WH8145> saying, <WH559> "What do you see? <WH7200>" I said, <WH559> "I see <WH7200> a boiling <WH5301> caldron; <WH5518> and it is tipping <WH6440> away from <WH6440> the north. <WH6828>"
Then Yahweh <WH3068> said <WH559> to me, <WH6828> "Out of the north evil <WH7451> will break out <WH6605> on all the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land. <WH776>

For, <WH7121> behold, I will call all the families <WH4940> of the kingdoms <WH4467> of the north, <WH6828>" says <WH5002> Yahweh; <WH3068> "and they shall come, <WH935> and they shall each <WH376> set <WH5414> his throne <WH3678> at the entrance <WH6607> of the gates <WH8179> of Jerusalem, <WH3389> and against all its walls <WH2346> all around, <WH5439> and against all the cities <WH5892> of Judah. <WH3063>

I will utter <WH1696> my judgments <WH4941> against them touching <WH5921> all their wickedness, <WH7451> in that they have forsaken <WH5800> me, <WH6999> and have burned incense to other <WH312> gods, <WH430> and worshiped <WH7812> the works <WH4639> of their own hands. <WH3027>

"You therefore put <WH247> your belt on your waist, <WH4975> arise, <WH6965> and speak <WH1696> to them all that I command <WH6680> you. <WH2865> Don't be dismayed at them, <WH6440> lest I dismay <WH2865> you before them. <WH6440>

For, <WH589> behold, I have made <WH5414> you this day <WH3117> a fortified <WH4013> city, <WH5892> and an iron <WH1270> pillar, <WH5982> and bronze <WH5178> walls, <WH2346> against the whole land, <WH776> against the kings <WH4428> of Judah, <WH3063> against its princes, <WH8269> against its priests, <WH3548> and against the people <WH5971> of the land. <WH776>
They will fight <WH3898> against you; <WH3201> but they will not prevail against you; <WH5002> for I am with you," says Yahweh, <WH3068> "to deliver you. <WH5337>"
